Math Rendering Test

Inline Math

Here's some inline math: f(x)=x2+3x−5f(x) = x^2 + 3x - 5f(x)=x​2​​+3x−5 and f′(x)=2x+3f'(x) = 2x + 3f​′​​(x)=2x+3.

Display Math

Here's a limit:

limx→0sinxx=1\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin x}{x} = 1 ​x→0​lim​​​x​​sinx​​=1

Fractions and Exponents

f(x)=x2−1x−1=(x−1)(x+1)x−1=x+1f(x) = \frac{x^2 - 1}{x - 1} = \frac{(x-1)(x+1)}{x-1} = x + 1 f(x)=​x−1​​x​2​​−1​​=​x−1​​(x−1)(x+1)​​=x+1

Derivatives

ddx[xn]=nxn−1\frac{d}{dx}[x^n] = nx^{n-1} ​dx​​d​​[x​n​​]=nx​n−1​​

Limits with subscripts

limh→0f(x+h)−f(x)h\lim_{h \to 0} \frac{f(x+h) - f(x)}{h} ​h→0​lim​​​h​​f(x+h)−f(x)​​

Complex expression

∫0∞e−x2dx=π2\int_0^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} ∫​0​∞​​e​−x​2​​​​dx=​2​​√​π​​​​​
